name: Bean Dozer
description:
Downloaded version will work much better than the browser version. 

Controls: 

WASD - Movement. Forwards/Reverse/Turning

R - Reset the Dozer

It's the beginning of the world. Push the beans off the edge into the abyss to produce energy. Get a bonus if you push beans into the glowing glass jar.

Push 25 beans and something might happen. More stuff might happen at 100 and 250 as well.

Made with Unity, Blender, Paint.net

All assets made by me. Code here if you want: https://github.com/TyLanger/Dozer

Versions: 001 is the version I submitted before the deadline. 012 is the version after some performance fixes. The web version approximates the colliders of the beans (so they roll) as there gets to be more beans, the downloaded version uses more accurate colliders (so they don't roll).
